title: MarQ By Flipkart 563 L Frost Free Side by Side Refrigerator  (Silver Steel, 563GSMQS)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, User Manual, Egg Tray, Ice Box, Spanner
product_specification.Other Features: Money Saving, Energy Efficient, Eco Mode, Super Cooling Mode, Super Freeze Function, Intelligent Touch Control, Deodorizer, Separate Crispers, Freezer Drawers
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Flipkart will facilitate Installation & Demo at time of your convenience from an brand authorized service engineer||Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page||The Installation & Demo service will be provided free of cost. All additional accessories not part of the the package will be charged separately||The authorized service engineer will be providing detailed demo that includes||Usage of the product||Explain all the functionality of the product||Preventive maintenance action to be taken
product_specification.Warranty Service Type: For Warranty claims or any product related issues please email at marq@flipkart.com or call us at 080-46609211
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 5 Years on Compressor Warranty from MarQ by Flipkart
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.In-the-door Water Dispenser: The in-door water dispenser gives you chilled water at the press of a button without even having to open the door.
product_description.Intelligent Inverter Technology: This refrigerator is equipped with the latest intelligent inverter compressor which consumes up to 35% lesser energy compared to a normal reciprocatory compressor, so you don’t have to worry about paying high electricity bills. It also has a door alarm which buzzes when the door is left open for more than 90 seconds (under controlled internal testing conditions).

review:
Awsome refrigerator for this price. Better build and features than branded ones. excellent packing.
Size is very huge than expected.
Touch temp control
water dispenser
simple back
perfect design
body is heavy and build quality is excellent
plenty of shelves
very quiet no sound even in full use.
First use - I kept in full high cold and everything freezed in freezer . So freezer level low is more enough and i see Ice made in an hour even i kept low freeze. So awsome.
As per standard it is very low power consumption compares to branded ones as I see 1.1 unit per day for 560 ltr refrigerator is nice.
Water dispensers child lock is useful as children will operate simply.
Temp child lock is nice feature, you can lock temp levels as it may be changed by children. Easy to operate touch control.
Easy to move over the floor as it has wheels and you can lock movement with stand lock, wrench for operating stand lock is provided in kit.
Adding this after usage a month. There is no power bill change it is very low consumption as my old 265 ltr refrigerator. So the power consumption is saving compared to other brands. Highly Recommended refrigerator in SBS sector

We had a 266L refrigerator but this Diwali we thought of gifting ourselves a bigger refrigerator. A SBS was out of question for us given the high prices asked but Marq was a boon for our ever increasing need.

Order and Delivery:
I ordered it within an hour after it was launched and the delivery was made on the 2nd day of the purchase.
It took 4 men to lift it to our home on the 1st floor. I'd advise people to only order this fantastic piece of appliance if you have a wide staircase or a lift.
The product is well packaged with well designed cardboard material.

Installation:
It was done barely 2 hours after the delivery. Since it was the first MarQ refrigerator delivered in my city, the representative from Jeeves was as clueless as me. Fortunately he had a installation video which he promptly shared.
The first thing during installation I'd suggest you to do is to make sure you lift the front legs of the refrigerator by turning it with your hand so that it stays in place as it has wheels on all 4 sides before using the refrigerator.

Operation:
Operation of the refrigerator is super easy. It's silent and doesn't vibrate at all. The doors are smooth to open and close. The LED lights are bright and light the whole compartment. The water dispenser has a capacity of 3 litres. It initially takes about 6 -24 hours for the refrigerator to reach the required temperature so do wait to evaluate its performance. Also, only the side walls (adjacent to doors) dissipate heat, thereby, requiring space for ventilation on the sides.

Value for money?
Definitely yes. I don't think one can get a better deal than this. Go for it!

Missing information?
1. No information available on the weight load factor of glass shelves.
2. No info if it has an inbuilt stabilizer as most refrigerators do.

Conclusion:
If I have to buy a refrigerator again I'd go for it without any second thoughts. It has a water dispenser which only a SBS with a price tag of upwards of 70+K has. Not only has it saved me money but its also a big space saving for me as we don't have to keep anymore bottles. It's silent. It's huge and it's presence is felt.

P.S. - The display panel is different as shown by Flipkart than the one I received. But that's okay, it has the same functions and design (but a white light would have been my personal preference). Also the manual has a lot of grammatical mistakes and errors. But that shouldn't be spoiling your decision whatsoever :-D

Hi,

The opinions after usage of a month.

Best things:
1. The price - bang on, affordable and well built. At this price point, i bet a proper good normal refrigerator would come.
2. The looks - super trendy, a definate peice of praise
3. The features - The description fits perfect with this product. The fridge is divided into 60:40 for fridge to freezer ratio. NO FROST as promised as a USP.
4. Color available is only grey and it looks ubercool.
5. Simple to use control panel
6. Chilled water dispenser - yes, you guessed it correct, the water tank is placed inside and is to be MANUALLY filled. Tank is 10-13 ltrs.

Didnt like:
1. Flipkart sent only 3 persons to transport the fridge, if u have an appartment, you will face a hard time transporting it to upper floors.
2. I just wish the freezer was convertible, so that the parts which is not being used as a freezer, could have been used as a fridge. However, somehow, the refrigerator only ices the products its supposed to, else things like sauces and pastes never gets iced, but reaches to much lower temperatures just before ice.
3. I wish there cud have been 1 or 2 colors available.

Best and awesome product by flipkart. features are too good and easy to use. installation and demo was done on the same day of delivery. worth the money. as usual on time safe and sound delivery by flipkart. instead of paying Lakhs for other models like LG and Samsung, better go for this. u will never regret

The Best Side By Side Frost Free Refrigerator that come in very affordable price by Flipkart's Marq the best part in this price range it has water dispenser.......the LED Panel is color different that's it.....we just love it love Flipkart for the delivery and installation it's very fast and reliable.

It's a very very good product . And their installation is also to good Mr amit and rajendra explained us the features and its a good product . It's performance is also too good and it's design is just too good .

lovely gift which we presented to our family.... with lot of skeptical thoughts we chose to go ahead with this but as of now it has met all our expectations... super quick ice... we need to have more ice trays, which we bought as extras.... nice asthetics with an option of maintaining temperature of both sides... the water dispenser holds uptown 2.5-3 lit of water... which is adequate for a family of 4 as we normally jus use a Lil bit of it with normal water...

Awesome product... Good design, Good quality, quick cooling and auto cut off, zero noise, quick delivery, custom adjust for freezor and fridge, movable product, water dispenser and overall superb, but very worst for demo man, he doesn't know about this side by side refrigerator and he is first time seeing and don't know about it and nothing helped to about my queries and doubts. Thanks to provide atleast user manual..

Just the kind of fridge that I wanted ...
Spacious, excellent cooling and freezing....
Value for money... 100%
Quality is good of both inside and outside..
I'm glad I chose a new brand MarQ instead of the regular brands... It was worth the risk and I am absolutely happy... Thank you MarQ
Ps... I bought a microwave of the same brand.

PS... The delivery person damaged my gate while unloading the fridge... Cost me a bomb to fix it... Hence such late review...

MARQ Refrigerator is installed today but service engineer did not explained properly all the features.. He was in hurry and wanted to run away. On phone he said that simply plug in your power supply and refrigerator is on. No need of my coming. Moreover Stabilizer is required compulsory whereas FLIPKART has never suggested for stabilizer installation.
Demo was not given properly, how water dispenser will work etc not explained by Service Engineer properly as he was in hurry and ran away in 7 minutes.
It is suggested to FLIPKART to take care of services provided for demo and installation by respective service Engineer. He was very rude, non-courteous and in hurry as if he was obliging for demo and installation of MARQ Refrigerator.

It certainly deserves 5 star and infact more than that, ur neighbours are going to be jealous of you, this is huge and beautiful fridge and performance is absolutely superb, Delivery and installation time was super quick, installation person was quick in installing but only thing missing was his knowledge about fridge, he doesn't know how to operate touch panel and other features, rest everything is awesome, better than any other brand refrigerators. Keep your eyes close and go for it.

Its been more than a year now and performance is still excellent, nothing like it. Once again recommending it to 100%.

Best side by side refrigerator in budget. It’s a Flipkart Brand. Energy efficient, huge space and classic look. No other refrigerator can give you water dispenser in this budget. It’s a classic budget side by side refrigerator

This is the best refrigerator in this price range. Its beats all the Samsung's and whirlpool and LG refrigerator in this 550 ltr capacity. And price wise its half of their price. Offers more than big companies. Writting this review after 4 months of use and it is giving flawless performance

I would only tell the -ves since you can read the +ves in all reviews.

1. Sides get very hot in summer. Almost like soup in a 5 star hotel hot.
2. Water drips in the non-freezer zone at the top. ( water = 3-5 drops per day)
3. Fridge needs 3-4 days to work properly after installation.
4. Finger print magnet
5. Extremely heavy but easy to move because of wheels.

After considering all the above points its still a good buy.

flipkart had delivered the product ontime and with very good packing condition. Quality and finish of the product is very good at this price. Demo provided by jeeves was also on time. overall iam satisfied with the product.

The fridge is awsome and works perfectly without any complaint from the last 12 days.Those looking for a better range refrigerators must go for this as this refrigerator is providing the same features as in 80k fridge.The thing is that marq doesnt have exclusive outlets that is why its price is little less but i dont see any compromise with build quality.Value for money extremely happy with the purchase.

Using it fr last one week everything is fine nw. good product with more value. Water dispenser is my favourite feature in it. It provides AI mode in it. Its very good. Let me chek for more time n update my review. As of nw i m really satisfied for choosing this product.

This product is absolutely awesome in terms of its looks, design, performance, volume and capacity. This has complete value for each penny. Truely like a must buy product.But the 3 delivery persons were terrible, just couldn't carry the product to my 2nd floor home in a single attempt citing narrow passage.I had to arrange for 3 outside labourers who handled with ease and delivered to my kitchen although I had to spend an additional Rs.600 for the same.The demo guy who came the next day was a rude, arrogant and equally horrible.Flipkart must show some professionalism and there's a lot more to in terms of delivery and demonstration
Best price and best product no noise at all till now and good finished and good quality cooling is very fast also. But few more features shld be added in the next model of the product...

Pros :

Nice product with having immense performance with providing the option to the user for setting the customised cooling temp.

Great design and colour template.

560L capacity including the utilities for ice cubes and holders are good enough for the home usage.

Cons :

Heating issue will be there at the initial usage, but it will be rectified after day to day usage.

It would have been better if any separate section for freezing is provided, apart from the open space in left and right sides.

Delivery process is very bad and I've waited 1 week more than the expected delivery date. Installation got delayed as well.


---

Awesome product in terms of price, quality and performance. Installation done very next day of delivery. Till date cooling is great and hope the same will continue in future as well. Very satisfied and happy with the product.
